name: Pashan Kala
overview: Manufactures and exports gemstone tiles, gemstone slabs, marble animals, marble sculptures, marble figures, embroidery christmas, hanging decoration, handmade embroidery badges, handmade patches, hand knotted woolen carpets, tufted carpets, shaggy carpets, leather stuffed animals, marble inlay plates, jewellery boxes, photo frames, flower vases, marble god statues, sand stone garden furniture, sand stone benches, sand stone statues, sand stone fountain, sand stone pots, sand stone planters, marble temples, wooden temples, alabaster animal figures, alabaster lamps, buddha statues, wooden handicrafts, glass handicrafts and brass handicrafts products.
